entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:01 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
